attributes.additional_details: As a government you can help those who feel at they’re lowest and struggle with every day life . Let’s put a stop to suicide please and  Not be pushed aside with medication .  More people are taking they’re lives everyday due to struggling and not having the correct help.
attributes.background: I want people who feel suicidal or are struggling with mental health to be able to drop in to a clinic to help them with they’re struggles any time of the day or night.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to fund 24 hour mental health drop in centres in England, if that's what you'd like to see happen.  If you start a new petition, you'll need to include your full name.

Information about 24 hour phone support is available here:

https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/nhs-voluntary-charity-services/charity-and-voluntary-services/get-help-from-mental-health-helplines/
